00093 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetRounded(const double& value) const
00094 {

00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 inline bool CFixedPointManip::IsEqual(const double& value1, const double& value2) const
00100 {
00101        return GetInternalValue(value1) == GetInternalValue(value2);
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 inline bool CFixedPointManip::IsSmaller(const double& value1, const double& value2) const
00106 {
00107        return GetInternalValue(value1) < GetInternalValue(value2);
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 inline bool CFixedPointManip::IsSmallerEqual(const double& value1, const double& value2) const
00112 {
00113        return GetInternalValue(value1) <= GetInternalValue(value2);
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetSmallerValue(const double& value) const
00118 {
00119        return GetNormalValue(GetInternalValue(value) - 1);
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetBiggerValue(const double& value) const
00124 {
00125        return GetNormalValue(GetInternalValue(value) + 1);
00126 }
00127

00129 // protected methods
00130 
00131 inline qint32 CFixedPointManip::GetInternalValue(double value) const
00132 {
00133        RoundingFuntionPtr function = m_roundingFuntionsPtr[m_roundingType];
00134 
00135        return qint32(function(value * m_scaleToIntFactor));
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetNormalValue(qint32 intValue) const
00140 {
00141        return intValue / m_scaleToIntFactor;
00142 }
